Html:
I'm not getting the option to change libram or compare them atm. I checked the item list & they are definitely there, they are just not showing as equipment options when I search for items for my ranged slot.
Also. The problem with the armor penetration persists in this latest update.

Keep up the good work thou. Rawr makes it a whole lot easier to gather the best gear set possible.
There is also a problem with the boss level not being able to choose the option for a level 83 boss. Fix these ASAP please as Rawr is an amazing source for gearset comparisson.
Damn dude, you don't need to post in every single frelling place about the Ret bug and give 1star reviews. Zurm has been gone a couple days, I'm sure he'll fix it when he gets back.
